title: Quiz 3 - Seating Arrangement
instruction:
Directions (Q. 21 – 25): Study the following information carefully and answer the questions.

P, Q, R, S, T, U, V and W are eight family members sitting around a circular table facing the centre. Three of them are alcoholic and others are non-alcoholic. All the eight family members like different sports, viz Football, Cricket, Chess, Badminton, Table Tennis, Kabaddi, Volleyball and Billiards but not necessarily in the same order.

There are two married couples, three brothers, two daughters, one granddaughter and one grandson in the family. Each of them likes a different beverage, viz Appy, Sprite, Coca Cola, Budweiser, Limca, Tuborg and ThumsUp. However, P and W like the same beverage.

T is sitting second to the right of his father V and he likes Table Tennis and ThumsUp. Only V’s daughter is seated exactly between P and T and she likes Limca and Kabaddi. V likes Football and is the head of the family and is the immediate neighbour of W and S. U sits third to the left of V. The grandmother of U is sitting on the immediate left of her. U is a non-alcoholic. The son of W is sitting on the immediate left of his father. His father likes Cricket. R likes Kabaddi and is sitting on the immediate left of her mother and she likes Limca. S is the husband of the one who likes Chess and Budweiser and his mother likes Budweiser. The one who likes Badminton sits second to the right of P, who is an immediate neighbour of the ones who like Kabaddi and Volleyball. The one who likes Volleyball does not like Appy. The one who likes Football does not like Coca Cola or Sprite. W likes Chess and Q likes Badminton. Neither of them likes Sprite. S likes Tuborg and sits second to the right of the one who likes Sprite. Only Tuborg and Budweiser are alcoholic drinks.

quiz.text: Four of the following five are alike in a certain way and so form a group. Which of the following does not belong to that group?
options: Mohit – Pizza
Sachin – Dosa
Ajay – Burger
Pratyush – Idli
Sujit – Uthappam

quiz.text: Which of the following combinations is true?
options: Deepak – Dosa – Kerala
Sachin – Pizza – Bihar
Ritesh – Sandwich – MP
Mohit – Paneer – UP
Kundan – Idli – Tamil Nadu

quiz.text: Which of the following statements is not true?
options: Pratyush and Ajay are immediate neighbours.
The one who likes Pizza sits on the immediate left of Ritesh.
Sujit sits opposite the one who likes Uttappam.
The one who likes Burger belongs to Karnataka.
All are true.

quiz.text: Which of the following belongs to Tamil Nadu?
options: The one who likes Noodles
The one who likes Sandwich
The one who likes Paneer
The one who likes Dosa
None of these

quiz.text: What is the position of the one who likes Uthappam with respect to the one who belongs to Karnataka?
options: Second to the right
Second to the left
Third to the left
Immediate right
None of these

quiz.text: F is related to ITC in the same way as T is related to HCL, based on the given arrangement. To who amongst the following is D related to following the same pattern?
options: Microsoft
Bata
Apple
HCL
Samsung

quiz.text: Which of the following is true regarding E?
options: None of the given options is true.
E is an immediate neighbour of the person from Samsung.
E sits at an extreme end of the line.
The person from Airtel faces E.
E is from ITC.

quiz.text: Who amongst the following sit at extreme end of the rows?
options: The person from Apple and F.
V, E
The person from Samsung and C.
The person from HCL and Bata.
R and the person from Reliance.

quiz.text: Four of the following five are alike in a certain way based on the given arrangement and so form a group. Which is the one that does not belong to that group?
options: R
V
C
B
F

quiz.text: Who amongst the following faces the person from Airtel?
options: The person from Reliance
B
The person from Google.
E
The person from Bata

quiz.text: Who among the following likes white?
options: A
B
C
D
E

quiz.text: Who is seated exactly opposite to the one who likes brown?
options: A
B
C
D
E

quiz.text: Which of the following colours does the person like who is to the immediate right of the one who likes white?
options: Yellow
Blue
Red
Green
Orange

quiz.text: Four among the following bear a similar relationship and hence form a group, who among the following does not belong to the group?
options: D
I
C
H
F

quiz.text: In which of the following groups is the third person seated exactly in between the first and the second person?
options: DEB
BJF
ECH
BHJ
BID

quiz.text: Which of the following persons likes Cricket?
options: A
C
G
I
None of these

quiz.text: Who sits third to the left of the one who likes Table Tennis?
options: The one who likes Ludo
The one who likes Chess
B
F
The one who likes Volleyball

quiz.text: Four of the following five are alike in a certain way and hence form a group. Which of the following doesn’t belong to that group?
options: E
The one who likes Rugby
I
The one who likes Carrom
The one who likes Cricket

quiz.text: What is the position of D with respect to A?
options: Immediate right
Second to the right
Fourth to the right
Can’t be determined
None of these

quiz.text: who among the following sits on the immediate left of the one who faces H?
options: C
I
B
D
None of these

quiz.text: Which of the following statements is true?
options: U is the immediate neighbour of R’s mother and V’s daughter.
Q’s mother sits on the immediate right of T.
T’s sister-in-law is the immediate neighbour of V and T.
Q sits opposite S’s sister.
None of these.

quiz.text: What is the position of S’s mother with respect to his wife?
options: Fourth to the left
Fourth to the right
Third to the right
Third to the left
Immediate right

quiz.text: If all the persons are sitting in alphabetical order starting from P in anti-clockwise direction, then the position of how many of them will remain unchanged (excluding P)?
options: None
One
Two
Four
Three

quiz.text: Which of the following is a group of only males?
options: S, Q, T, W
V, S, W, Q, P
P, R, T, S
T, Q, S, V
S, Q, U, W

quiz.text: Who among the following sits second to the left of W’s son?
options: The one who is the immediate neighbour of R and S’s brother.
The one who sits on the immediate right of V’s daughter.
The one who sits opposite Q.
The one who sits fourth to the left of S’s wife
None of these
